heading: TARGETED MUSCLES: Shoulders and upper back. WHAT YOU NEED: Sturdy, armless chair. TIP: As you progress, cross your arms and interlace fingers. This exercise is good for your shoulders and upper-back muscles.

steps.1: Sit in a sturdy, armless chair with your feet flat on the floor, shoulder-width apart.
steps.2: Hold arms in front of you at shoulder height with palms facing outward.
steps.3: Relax your shoulders, keep your upper body still, and reach forward with your hands. Stop when you feel a stretch or slight discomfort.
